requestBody.description: tagKey[:tagValue] Only json format date/times/numerics are recognized as such. ISO-8601

schema.description: multiple meta key:value to insert or update. not listed existing keys remain as is

post.description: Create a sharelink which allows accessing a file. To download a file use [/nodes/{nodeId}/downloadUrl](#/download-rest-controller/downloadUrl) or asyc [/downloads](#/download-rest-controller/requestDownload) endpoints instead.

schema.description: multiple meta key:value to insert or update. not listed existing keys remain as is

post.description: Initiate a new download (multiple files and folder nodes supported). Check the response and use /downloads/{downloadId}/status if the download is not yet ready.
Connection to a generic folders. In case of a already existing gerenic folder, it will be disconnected and connected to the new one.

parameters.name: parentNodeId
parameters.description: Box or folder nodeId to query.

expected.description: must contain fox, can be red or brown

exclude.description: must contain fox, can be red but not brown

get.description: Presigned short living resource url for services (expires in 30 minutes, only for files). For the client download feature (multiple files and folders) use async /downloads endpoints instead.

parameters.name: acceptMessageIds
parameters.description: Accepted MessageIds to get a DownloadUrl in case of an error/warning. '*' to accept everything and bypass AVScan.

schema.description: Accepted MessageIds to get a DownloadUrl in case of an error/warning. '*' to accept everything and bypass AVScan.

delete.description: Disconnects a generic folder. The folder will not be deleted.

recursive.description: true -> watch also for changes in any subfolder

boxVariant.description: Box Variant. null is simple box.

url.description: POST webhook url. For body see schema WebhookInfo

secret.description: Secret to calculate auth signature of the body (SHA-256 HMAC). Sent in header as X-DeepBox-Signature-256

recursive.description: true -> call also for changes in any subfolder
true -> watch also for changes in any subfolder

boxVariant.description: Box Variant. null is simple box.
Box Variant. null is simple box.

callbackUrl.description: POST callback url. For body see schema CallbackInfo

callbackSecret.description: Secret to calculate auth signature of the body (SHA-256 HMAC). Send in header as X-DeepBox-Signature-256
